qas.question: What do Somali men wear when they aren't wearing Western clothing?
What piece of clothing is the macawis similar to?
Aside from the koofiyad, what do Somali men wear on their head?

context: When not dressed in Westernized clothing such as jeans and t-shirts, Somali men typically wear <a1_0>the macawis<a1_0/>, which is a <a3_0>sarong<a3_0/>-like garment worn <a2_0>around the waist<a2_0/>. On their heads, they often wrap a colorful <a4_0>turban<a4_0/> or wear the koofiyad, <a0_0>an embroidered fez<a0_0/>.
